kiwi.event
Interface PropertyChangeSource

All Known Implementing Classes:
Config, UIChangeManager
public interface PropertyChangeSource

Interface that must be implemented by objects that are sources of PropertyChangeEvents.

Author:
Mark Lindner, PING Software Group
See Also:
PropertyChangeEvent

Method Summary
 void addPropertyChangeListener(java.beans.PropertyChangeListener listener)
          Register a new property change listener.
 void removePropertyChangeListener(java.beans.PropertyChangeListener listener)
          Unregister a property change listener.
 

Method Detail

addPropertyChangeListener

public void addPropertyChangeListener(java.beans.PropertyChangeListener listener)
Register a new property change listener.

Parameters:
listener - The PropertyChangeListener to be added to this object's list of listeners.

removePropertyChangeListener

public void removePropertyChangeListener(java.beans.PropertyChangeListener listener)
Unregister a property change listener.

Parameters:
listener - The PropertyChangeListener to be removed from this object's list of listeners.
